text: From your HubSpot account go to Forms form and click on create form button after thaty you can select the type of form like- Regular form or Popup Form > after that you can select a blank form for your customized fields or can select any other pre-built form as per your need.
Hello guys, i am new for Hubdb , can anyone help me with some issues?
Best thing to do is to post your question in <#C22PDRW72|data-driven-content>
